record.label: modify.format
record.comments: for $L.x = 1 to $L.last.line do ($L.old=1;$L.delta=0;$L.lng=1;$L.safe=0;for $L.i = 1 to $L.max do (if (2 in $L.i in field in $L.format=$L.x) then if (not null(8 in $L.i in field in $L.format) and (8 in $L.i in field in $L.format)~#" ") then ($L.temp=8 in $L.i in field in $L.format;if (substr($L.temp, 1, 1)="$") then (if (type($L.temp)=8) then ($L.lng=max(lng(denull($L.temp)), $L.lng))) else (if (type($L.temp in $L.file)=8) then ($L.lng=max(lng(denull($L.temp in $L.file)), $L.lng);$L.old=max(5 in $L.i in field in $L.format, $L.old);5 in $L.i in field in $L.format=$L.lng))));$L.delta=$L.lng - $L.old;if ($L.delta~=0) then (if ($L.delta<0) then (for $L.j = 1 to $L.max do (if (2 in $L.j in field in $L.format<$L.x+$L.old and 2 in $L.j in field in $L.format>=$L.x) then ($L.safe=max($L.safe, 2 in $L.j in field in $L.format)));if ($L.safe>0) then $L.delta+=($L.safe - $L.x)) else ($L.safe=($L.x+$L.old) - 1);for $L.i = 1 to $L.max do (if (2 in $L.i in field in $L.format>$L.safe) then (2 in $L.i in field in $L.format)+=$L.delta)))

statements.statements: for $L.i = 1 to $L.max do ($L.temp=1 in $L.i in field in $L.format;for $L.x = 1 to 11 do (if ($L.temp>2**(15 - $L.x)) then $L.temp-=(2**(15 - $L.x));if ($L.temp={8, 9, 10, 12, 14}) then (8 in $L.i in field in $L.format=NULL)))
for $L.i = 1 to $L.max do ($L.last.line=max($L.last.line, 2 in $L.i in field in $L.format))

while ($L.x<=$L.last.line) do (for $L.i = 1 to $L.max do ($L.old=1;$L.delta=0;$L.lng=1;$L.safe=0;if (2 in $L.i in field in $L.format=$L.x) then if (not (null(8 in $L.i in field in $L.format)) and (8 in $L.i in field in $L.format)~#" ") then ($L.temp=8 in $L.i in field in $L.format;if (substr($L.temp, 1, 1)="$") then (if (type(evaluate(parse($L.temp, 8)))=8) then ($L.temp=evaluate(parse($L.temp, 8));$L.lng=max(lng(denull($L.temp)), $L.lng))) else (if (type($L.temp in $L.file)=8) then ($L.lng=max(lng(denull($L.temp in $L.file)), $L.lng)));if (5 in $L.i in field in $L.format>=0) then ($L.old=max(5 in $L.i in field in $L.format, $L.old);5 in $L.i in field in $L.format=$L.lng;$L.delta=$L.lng - $L.old;if (1 in $L.i in field in $L.format={64, 68}) then (5 in $L.i in field in $L.format=$L.old;$L.delta=0);if ($L.delta~=0) then (if ($L.delta<0) then (for $L.j = 1 to $L.max do (if (2 in $L.j in field in $L.format<$L.x+$L.old and 2 in $L.j in field in $L.format>=$L.x) then ($L.safe=max($L.safe, 2 in $L.j in field in $L.format)));if ($L.safe>0) then $L.delta+=($L.safe - $L.x)) else ($L.safe=($L.x+$L.old) - 1);for $L.i = 1 to $L.max do (if (2 in $L.i in field in $L.format>$L.safe) then (2 in $L.i in field in $L.format)+=$L.delta));$L.last.line+=$L.delta)));$L.x+=1)
